name: honey
tagline: A self-hosted bookmark manager with tagging search and previews
description: Honey is a self hosted bookmark manager with tagging, search and thumbnail previews. It lets users save and organize links in collections with a clean interface, acting as a personal or shared knowledge hub for the web.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Save and organize web links with titles, descriptions, and tags

features.title: Tag System
features.description: Categorize bookmarks with flexible tagging for easy organization

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search through bookmark titles, descriptions, and tags instantly

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Migrate bookmarks from browsers or other bookmark managers
